question: Hello:) First off ,congrats to all the beautiful  mommies to be!!.Im a new  mama to be,  my lil boy is  due June 28th. Upon taking the NIPT test everything came back negative,thank God however my papp a level was at a 5 percentile which is low. My doctor  simply  told me I have to be closely  monitored  for a possibility  of developing  preeclampsia and we need extra sonogram visits  to watch my babies  growth. Of course  ,I googled  low Papp-a. .big mistake! I nearly  gave myself  a major panic  attack! !im so scared  ,I go for the full anatomical survey Feb.9th . Has anyone had this diagnosis  before? ?My doctor  told me to breathe,there  is nothing  to worry  about.. I guess I'll  have more peace of mind  next month.
title: Low Papp-a level
